document.full_text: twelve people were killed and 80 wounded in violent protests on wednesday against the killing of two men and two women in a night-time raid by foreign troops in north afghanistan, the head of the provincial hospital said.
document.title: ten dead in protests after two women killed in afghan raid
lines_and_colors: twelve people were killed and 80 wounded in violent protests on wednesday against the killing of two men and two women in a night-time raid by foreign troops in north afghanistan, the head of the provincial hospital said.
